column4: hello guys, im trying to change the location of my home folder to a different partition. How can i move /home if it is in use?
first set up a new, big enough parti ...
then copy your old /home to the new.....
let's say you did a new parti, sda6
then you copy everything from / home to it
then you got to alter fstab to use f.e. sda6  as home
but there is an entry for home already
you got to change it then
and i dont know the UUID of the new partition
heres my problem... it doesnt show that partition...
ok, my bad, forgot to use sudo
i just edited fstab, files are copied, now how can i move the home?
